>Starfield was a flop of titanic proportions that outed Bethesda's long running faults
>The Horizon IP is stillbirth made intellectual property and astroturfed with no relevancy
>Stalker 2 is a disappointing piece of shit with no soul that compares badly to real Stalker let alone Anomeme
>Cyberpunk 2077 had a gutted release that turned into a meme, kinda recovered but never delivered on the marketing
>Spiderman 2 was a huge underperformer that burned a massive IP while MCU compoetely deflated
>Dragon's Dogma 2 was such an hilarious underperformer and disappointment it literally has no fans even among those who liked the original

Literally the only successful AAA games of 2020s. Elden Ring and Shadow of the Erdtree are the only good games we got in the last 5 years.

item.title: [ 83] /pcbg/ - PC Building General
item.description:
9070 bios mod edition
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MRr6c68ZyI0

>UPGRADE & BUILD ADVICE.
Post build list or current specs including MONITOR: https://pcpartpicker.com/
Provide specific use cases.
State BUDGET and COUNTRY or you will NOT be helped.
Building guide: https://wiki.installgentoo.com/index.php/Build_a_PC

>CASE (from $ to $$$)
mATX: Asus Prime AP201, Lian Li A3, O11 Air Mini
ATX: Phanteks XT PRO (ULTRA), Montech AIR 903 Base/MAX, Lian Li Lancool 207, Antec C8, Antec Flux Pro
AVOID: 'Silent' cases, fanless cases, Corsair 6500

>CPU
Budget: 12400F, 7600
Gaming: AMD X3D
Workstation: 9950X3D, 9950X, 7950X

>COOLER
AIO: Best Value: Thermalright Frozen Prism, Premium LCD: Lian Li Galahad II LCD
Double towers: Thermalright Phantom Spirit 120 SE, Noctua NH-D15 G2
ITX/>42mm RAM: Scythe Fuma 3/TR AXP120-X67

>MOTHERBOARD
AVOID ASRock for X3D

>RAM
DDR4: 2x16GB 3600CL18
DDR5: 2x16GB 6000CL30

>SSD (OS drive)
Budget: Silicon Power UD90
Mid range: SN7100
Premium: 990 PRO, SN850X
Flagship: Sabrent Rocket 5, 9100 PRO

>GPU
1080p: RX 9070, RX 9070 XT; Budget: Arc B580
1440p: RTX 5070 TI, RX 9070 XT
4K: RTX 5090; Budget: see 1440p
ALWAYS pair AMD GPUs with AMD CPUs for SAM https://imgur.com/a/7XecPGL

>PSU
https://hwbusters.com/best_picks/best-atxv3-pcie5-ready-psus-picks-hardware-busters/

>MONITOR
https://pcmonitors.info/recommendations/

>OS
Activate Windows @ >>>/g/fwt

>CASE FANS
Meta: Case with good stock PWM fans
Mid range: Arctic P12/P14 (Max) (5-pack)
High end: Noctua NF-A12x25, Noctua NF-A14x25 G2

item.title: [110] AI Pokemon Thread /NAPT/ Thread 175: power of frenshipEdition
item.description:
This is a general thread for people to post their AI art, and make requests from others who may want to attempt making their own Pokemon related gens.

NovelAI is a paid AI generator. Opus tier users have "unlimited" Small/Normal generations, though editing tools require credits.

Microsoft's Bing AI is a free image generator that is powered by DALL¬∑E 3.

Civitai is free using its ‚Äòbuzz‚Äô currency. You get about 50 every day plus more for liking models and gens.
>civitai.com

Otaiku is a (mostly) free mobile app. An ad watch is required between each image generation unless you pay.
>ailla.biz/otaiku

Tensor is free to use as well, although you are limited to how many gens you can make per day.
>https://tensor.art/

Local Generation using Stable Diffusion requires a decent video card. Guides for local genning can be found in the /g/ threads:
>>>/g/sdg

Other Stable Diffusion threads are on: /h/, /e/, /d/, /b/, /vt/, /aco/, /trash/

Hailuo AI takes uploaded art and animates them based on the prompts you get. You get a 3-day free trial, followed by roughly 3 free gens a day afterward. Subscription plans are available.
>https://hailuoai.video/

Pastebin of Pokemon artists:
>https://pastebin.com/U0mmK3Tm (embed)

Characters with under 300 images will require more tags to have them look correct. This is a list of all Pokemon characters with over 300 images:
>https://danbooru.donmai.us/posts?tags=*_%28pokemon%29+&z=5

If you plan on sharing multiple images together, we'd recommend posting just one, and give links for the rest. This way we can conserve space.

This is a locally run html tool provided by ThatOneAiAnon. It keeps track of all artists you like and turns Danbooru's entire tag system in a collapsible list of buttons. You can edit all the js, css, html code to modify the tool. (Ask him for updated versions or more Nai4 tools)
>mega .nz/file/67xwTRSB#m0fPUmJRaWd3oh47gt6nw2LKNMe820TaiKdXTAhx8tI

Original filename: 1744252362250388.jpg

item.title: [ 65] TikTok Doc decries ADHD meds; HN on life support
item.description:
https://nypost.com/2025/04/09/health/cardiologist-warns-commonly-prescribed-drug-is-toxic-for-heart/
>and the other is the amphetamine class like Adderall and Vyvanse.‚Äù
>Both types, he said, ‚Äúincrease the levels of norepinephrine in the blood, which can lead to slightly higher blood pressure and a mild increase in risk of arrhythmias.‚Äù
>That might sound minor, but new research and common-sense questions have Levine sounding the alarm.
>‚ÄúWe know that very elevated levels of norepinephrine for years, like in people with adrenal tumors and heart failure, can adversely affect the heart ‚Äî levels are much higher here,‚Äù Levine said.
>‚ÄúWhat if a child takes this for 20 years? The FDA never commented on this. Or an elderly patient takes this ‚Äî or anyone at risk, people with congenital heart conditions like a bicuspid aortic valve, which 1.5% of the population has and are at risk for aortic aneurysms? The FDA never did their job.‚Äù
>And now? The longer-term data is starting to back him up.
>‚ÄúIn April 2024, they find that when you follow them up for eight years, young healthy people aged 20 to 40, they have a 57% higher risk than young healthy people not on these meds,‚Äù Levine said.

Original filename: Screenshot 2025-04-09 at 17-30-34 Cardiologist warns commonly prescribed drug is toxic for heart.png
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [ 31] Anybody from a third-world country ever (legally) travel to the US?
item.description:
Is it really as hard as it seems? My friend in Colombia is trying to visit the US but it seems unreasonably hard to get a tourist visa. Do they really require an in-person interview at the US embassy in Bogota? He doesn't live anywhere near Bogota, how is that reasonable to expect him to travel all the way to Bogota ? Is there any way around that or can he do the interview over the phone? He's just trying to get a tourist visa, not become an immigrant, so why make him pay for a flight and take extra days off work just for a tourist visa?

And how long does it actually take to get a tourist visa approved? How long in advance does he need to plan the trip?

Original filename: US-visa-1366x768-2187306852.jpg
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [ 98] /ptg/ - Private Trackers General
item.description:
just one kiss Edition

>Not sure what private trackers are all about?
A private tracker is a torrent website that provides the same functionality as a public tracker but is invite-only. Each member share common goals: collecting, preserving and discussing media.

>Have a question?
- FAQ https://archive.is/UVQkn
- WIKI https://igwiki.lyci.de/wiki/Private_trackers
- STUDY https://www.cambridge.org/core/services/aop-cambridge-core/content/view/2F379FE0CB50DF502F0075119FD3E060
- SPREADSHEET https://hdvinnie.github.io/Private-Trackers-Spreadsheet/
- TEN CURRY COMMANDMENTS https://pastebin.com/raw/dBbdE73M
- TEN NEON COMMANDMENTS https://pastebin.com/raw/Ud2pGYaE
- IRC irc://irc.sageru.org#ptg

Use >>>/g/ptg as a link to find the /ptg/ thread.

>Remember the following:
>READ THE OP BEFORE MAKING A FUCKING QUESTION YOU RETARDED FAGGOT
>It doesn't matter if you use the same username in different trackers, the staff still share your IP with each other.
>Staff is reading, being /marked/ is NOT a meme, and even if it is, it isn't.
>Don't ask for invites, it's private for a reason.
>If starting out you should interview for RED, rank to TM, wait on account age and get invites from there. THAT'S IT THAT IS ALL YOU HAVE TO DO
>Bonus points are for hoarding, not for spending.
>When the website dies, you will be able to migrate your bp and buffer to animeZ
>the easiest way into trackers is a time machine

>„ÄêNEWS„Äë
>>104996172 rarefilmm banned on PTP
>>104980501 anon got 2 out of 3
>>104980770 donations are trickling .in
>>104984481 french regional trackers are a shit


Previous thread: >>104979929

item.title: [ 51] Trump announces 90-day pause on ‚Äòreciprocal‚Äô tariffs with exception of China
item.description:
https://www.cnn.com/2025/04/09/business/reciprocal-tariff-pause-trump/index.html
President Donald Trump announced a complete pause on all the ‚Äúreciprocal‚Äù tariffs that went into effect at midnight, with the exception of China.

Tariffs on China will be increased to 125% from 104%, he said.

Trump in a Truth Social post Wednesday said he has ‚Äúauthorized a 90 day PAUSE, and a substantially lowered Reciprocal Tariff during this period, of 10%, also effective immediately.‚Äù

‚ÄúBased on the lack of respect that China has shown to the World‚Äôs Markets, I am hereby raising the Tariff charged to China by the United States of America to 125%, effective immediately,‚Äù Trump said in his social media post. ‚ÄúAt some point, hopefully in the near future, China will realize that the days of ripping off the U.S.A., and other Countries, is no longer sustainable or acceptable,‚Äù he wrote.

Stocks rocketed higher on the news, with the Dow surging 2,200 points, or 5.9%. The S&P 500 rose 6.5% and the Nasdaq was more than 8% higher.

Trump, however, did not indicate he was pausing the 10% universal tariff on all trading partners, with the exception of Canada and Mexico, that went into effect over the weekend. Therefore, countries that were subjects of reciprocal tariffs will continue to have a 10% tariff levied on them.

Original filename: 1743562230347138.jpg
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [ 92] White House Confirms Trump Is Exploring Ways To ‚ÄòDeport‚Äô U.S. Citizens
item.description:
https://www.huffpost.com/entry/white-house-confirms-trump-is-exploring-ways-to-deport-us-citizens_n_67f580abe4b0a5ea5c7608d2

White House press secretary Karoline Leavitt said Tuesday that President Donald Trump is exploring legal pathways to ‚Äúdeport‚Äù U.S. citizens to El Salvador, where the administration has already arranged to house deported immigrants in a prison known for its human rights abuses. (Watch the video, above.)

Leavitt suggested the effort would be limited to people who have committed major crimes, but Trump has also mentioned the possibility of sending people who commit lesser offenses abroad.

Any such move on the part of the Trump administration is certain to be challenged in court. It is also not clear what legal authority could be used to justify expelling U.S. citizens from their homeland.

‚ÄúThese would be heinous, violent criminals who have broken our nation‚Äôs laws repeatedly. These are violent, repeat offenders on American streets,‚Äù Leavitt told reporters at a press briefing.

‚ÄúThe president has said if it‚Äôs legal, right, if there is a legal pathway to do that. He‚Äôs not sure, [and] we are not sure if there is,‚Äù Leavitt continued. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs an idea that he has simply floated and has discussed very publicly in the effort of transparency.‚Äù

Original filename: 1740778791723484.png

item.title: [ 39] Texan scientists un-extinct the dire wolf species
item.description:
While California is bickering about fringe minority issues, the Great Men in Texas just un-extincted an entire species. Un-extincted is expected to be added to dictionaries everywhere after this pivotal achievement
They used the DNA found in a species known as Dire Wolf that went extinct 10,000 years ago, and made 20 precise edits to it using DNA from its closing living relative, and then grew them in a surrogate mother.
They were born October 1 2024 and are currently alive and healthy.
https://www.ibtimes.co.uk/meet-dire-wolf-trio-remus-romulus-khaleesi-how-texas-lab-revived-extinct-species-1732511
Meet The Dire Wolf Trio Remus, Romulus And Khaleesi: How A Texas Lab Revived An Extinct Species

It was once thought to be a creature of fantasy, made famous by Game of Thrones, but now the legendary dire wolf has returned‚Äîsort of. Scientists at Texas-based biotech company Colossal Biosciences claim to have successfully revived the extinct predator through cutting-edge gene editing, producing three live wolf pups that carry dire wolf DNA for the first time in over 12,000 years.

The landmark achievement marks the world's first successful instance of de-extinction, according to The New York Times. Although the animals are not exact replicas of the ancient species, they carry 20 key dire wolf genes, including those influencing size, coat colour, and build.

Two males named Romulus and Remus were born in October 2024, and three months later, a female named Khaleesi. All three now live in a secure, 2,000-acre preserve somewhere in the northern United States. The wolves are already showing telltale traits: white, dense fur, large bodies, bushy tails and thick manes. According to Colossal's chief scientific officer, Beth Shapiro, the animals represent the closest humans have come to bringing an extinct species back to life.

Original filename: üê∫ Romulus & Remus üê∫.png

item.title: [ 50] Moving to Northern England
item.description:
On the verge of completing my Computer Science degree in Canada. For the life of me, I can not even land an internship or even get an interview here, given every job has 100+ applicants at minimum. In general, even a position for a part-time dishwasher job will get 500+ applications making even min wage jobs impossibly hard to get. I have dual citizenship and looking things up on OpenRent there are quite a few flats for about 600-800 in Newcastle, which is way cheaper than anything in this country. How is the tech market in Newcastle? Is it chavvy? If I'm going to the UK I'd rather avoid anything to do with the city of London.

Original filename: 6988813d8caa6b02140a7ed280ded0f8.gif

item.title: [ 58] what strange / spooky stuff have you seen? once when i was in the desert, th
item.description:
what strange / spooky stuff have you seen?

once when i was in the desert, there was a telephone pole, on it looked exactly like a 10ft tall bird of prey, just eyeing me down
it was about a good 5min of walking, which felt like forever, just to see that it was a transformer that looked weird, none of the other poles had it either
sounds dumb, but it really did look exactly like a gigantic human sized hawk, and the "head" even seemed to follow you too, really interesting illusion, since it also hit all the primal parts of the brain that gone "you're about to be fucking eaten by a bird!!!!!!"
a year or two later, when i was gonna take a picture, it was gone, which adds a strange air to "it was right there, i tell you!"

>inb4 go to /x/ for this shit
i want real stories, not >i smelled the rotten shit fart gas, and my best friend was turned into a skinwalker, and then i pulled out that gun from videogame and blasted it, dude trust me

Original filename: pngtree-the-light-shining-through-a-tunnel-of-tree.gif
